Moderation.description: The Moderation team works to moderate our Discord server, keeping harmful content out and making sure our league is a welcoming community
questions: Why do you want to become a moderator?
What experience do you have moderating in other servers?
How do you handle conflicts between users?
What is the most important quality in a moderator?
Would you mute someone because you believe they are not being respectul of you?
If someone was spamming, how long would you mute them?
Is it doxxing to send a picture of someone that they obtained from the person themselves?
How active are you in our league chats?

Streamer.description: Our Streaming team is responsible for streaming the most anticipated matchups in our league
questions: How long have you been streaming for?
List all leagues you have streamed in
Do you have any custom graphics? (Scoreboards, animations, etc.)
How active are you?
Please submit all socials that you stream on so we can review your past work.

Statistics.description: The Statistics department is responsible for inputting all of the statistics from submitted games
questions: Why are you interested in joining our statistics team?
What experience do you have entering statistics?
What would you do if a player complained that their stats had not been entered?
How would you respond if one of your friends asked you to input false stats to help them out?

Media.description: The Media department is responsible for our graphic arts, social media presence, and other media outputs from the league
questions: First and most importantly, you do understand this isn't an application for a media channel or anything league-media related?
What is your skill set or skill sets? (Ex: GFX, video editing)
Why are you interested in joining our media team?
What are some ideas you have for our social media presence?

History.description: The History department is responsible for updating the History blog channels in our leagues with each season's playoffs, awards, season/all-time records, etc.
questions: How long have you been in Providence RoSports leagues?
Which league do you main? (You can name more than one)
Which league interests you the most to work history on?
How active do you intend to be?
Why do you want to work in history?

Referee.description: The Referee team is responsible for enforcing the league's rules outside of the Discord server. Dealing with game calls, player reports, and more.
questions: Why are you interested in joining the Referee team?
If you are unsure about if something is a rule, where would you go to find out?
If someone asked for an ownership transfer and you don't know if that is allowed or not, what document would you check to find out?
If someone challenges a play, would you make a decision on your own or would you wait for others to chime in? How long would you wait?

Team Owner.description: Apply to be the owner of a team
questions: Please list any relevant leagues you have owned a team in.
Provide an invite to your teamhub (Required)
What play format is the league? (Ex: 4v4, 7v7).
How would you go about scheduling a game?
What command allows you to sign players?
What command allows you to submit your score/stats from a game?

Captain.description: Apply to become a QBB captain
questions: What does a QBB captain do?
How many QBBs do you intend to a week roughly?
What makes you qualified?
Have you been a QBB captain in other related leagues?
Do you have any QB accolades that make you eligible for QBB captain?

Media Center.description: Apply for access to media center (Award winners/7,500+ legacy score only)
questions: Why do you want to join media center?
How active are you?
What accolades do you have?

Media Channel.description: Apply for your own media channel
questions: What would your media channel be called?
What would the emoji for your channel be? (No custom emojis)
Have you owned a media channel in any other related leagues? If so, list them.
Could you describe some segments you have made.
Do you make any sort of extra attributes for your medias? (GFX, VFX, videos, etc.)
How active are you on a scale of 1-10?
